name: Hand of the Apprentice
summary: You can magically hurl your weapon at your foe.
description:
You can magically hurl your weapon at your foe. You gain the hand of the apprentice universalist spell. Universalist spells are a type of focus spell, much like school spells. You start with a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. See here for more information about focus spells.Hand of the Apprentice Leads To...

Universal Versatility
